Subject: In what order are the test run through...
Message-Id: <20010419184314.630276828@...>
From: Christian van der Leeden <leeden@...>

Hi all,

	I'm testing some classes which leave state in the db. This one is
a user class. So I definitely want to have the test to create the
user before the test to search for the user. AND I'd prefer
to set this up with new TestSuite(User.class) instead of
adding the methods by hand.

Is there a specific ordering of the test runs (or method calls)?
Is the solution to add the test cases by hand?
suite.addTest("testAddUser");
suite.addTest("findUser");

CU

Christian
P.S.: I don't quite get the TestDecorator and couldn't find an example.
          A hint is highly appreciated :-)
subject: In what order are the test run through...
